<h3 id="X38151">X(38151) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(7), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^6-5*(b+c)*a^5-(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a^4-2*(b+c)^3*a^3+2*(b-c)^4*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(7*b^2+10*b*c+7*c^2)*a-5*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38151) = X(7)+2*X(19925) = X(10)+2*X(5805) = 3*X(10)-2*X(38126) = 4*X(142)-X(4297) = X(144)-7*X(7989) = 2*X(2550)+X(4301) = 3*X(3817)-2*X(38037) = 3*X(5805)+X(38126) = 3*X(9779)-X(24644) = 2*X(38030)-3*X(38054) = X(38030)-3*X(38107) = X(38036)-3*X(38073) = X(38037)-3*X(38150) = 3*X(38073)+X(38149) = 3*X(38076)-2*X(38158) = 3*X(38094)-2*X(38123) = 3*X(38094)-4*X(38172) = 3*X(38137)+X(38170) = 4*X(38137)+X(38201) = 4*X(38170)-3*X(38201)</b>
<p>X(38151) lies on these lines: {2,165}, {7,19925}, {10,5805}, {30,38094}, {142,4297}, {144,7989}, {388,5542}, {515,38030}, {517,38137}, {518,38155}, {519,38036}, {527,38076}, {758,38153}, {971,5883}, {1503,38187}, {2550,4301}, {2802,38152}, {2829,38207}, {3062,3832}, {3091,4312}, {3244,20330}, {3634,5759}, {3671,6835}, {5221,5729}, {5587,5850}, {5735,8165}, {5762,10175}, {5806,15587}, {5833,18250}, {5842,38208}, {5843,38140}, {5845,38146}, {5847,38143}, {5851,38161}, {5852,38162}, {5853,34640}, {6173,34648}, {6684,31671}, {10165,38171}, {11038,28236}, {11372,12571}, {12053,15950}, {18492,36996}, {19883,38031}, {21151,28164}, {28160,38111}, {28194,38121}, {28204,38041}, {28208,38080}, {31657,31673}</p>
<p>
X(38151) = midpoint of X(38036) and X(38149)<br>
X(38151) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3817, 38150), (10164, 38204), (10165, 38171), (38054, 38107), (38123, 38172)<br>
X(38151) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38073, 38149, 38036), (38123, 38172, 38094)<br>
</p>
